com.mongodb

Class ServerAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.ServerAddress
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DBAddress

    @Immutable
public class ServerAddress
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents the location of a Mongo server - i.e. server name and port number
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
